short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get warned before spending valuable time on unproductive websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing FocusBoost for Google Chrome:

Stop wasting valuable time mindlessly scrolling through social media or distracting websites.  FocusBoost allows you to setup alerts for the sites you lose most productivity to so that you waste less time!

Simply type in a website and select the frequency alert popups you feel will help you and that's it!

This is perfect for people who find themselves scrolling through social media or browsing websites out of habit.  End your bad habit today with FocusBoost.
